short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and copy color codes from web pages (Developed by Papun).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Color Picker - Extract and Copy Color Codes Effortlessly!"
Discover and extract color codes from any web page with ease using the Color Picker Chrome extension. Perfect for designers, developers, and color enthusiasts, this tool allows you to:
1. Use an intuitive eyedropper tool to select colors directly from any web page.
2. Instantly view the HEX or RGB code of the selected color.
3. Copy color codes to your clipboard with a single click for quick use in your projects.
4. Simplify your workflow by seamlessly picking and organizing colors on the go.

Developed with user-friendliness in mind, this extension is a must-have for anyone who works with colors. Try it today and add a splash of creativity to your designs!
(Developed by Papun)
